title: Increased human capital, output and real wage rise

content.prompt: Assuming no change in the nominal wage and a significant increase in human capital, the output per worker will

choices.label: increase and the real wage will decrease
increase and the real wage will increase
decrease and the real wage will decrease
decrease and the real wage will increase
increase and the real wage will remain unchanged

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
